data.name: Chubby Bear Smash Demo
data.detailed_description:
From the developer of Runster and Fitforce.

A fantasy adventure of a bear looking for delicious honey, but will he be able to complete his journey?

The forest is acting strange and the bees are evolving somehow, they are getting bigger and stronger but your tummy is growling so hard for something sweet. As a bear, you will have to overcome these bees to get your claw on yummy honey inside. Let's get moving, your tummy can't wait any longer!

Motion-sensing control through a webcam:

Use your body movement to attack the tree and fight angry bees until the beehive falls.


3 Gameplay modes available:

train yourself and take on the challenges.


(1) Journey: Encounter a series of enemies, beat those bees. Complete the journey and eat the most delicious honey.

(2) Quick Fight: Short fight with the enemies you have encountered. Revisit them for fun or to train yourself for the rematch.

(3) Endless: Fight endless waves of stronger enemies. Every time you defeat the enemy, you can choose a new talent to upgrade and customize the play style in your way.
Your result will be recorded on the leaderboard, challenge yourself and become the strongest bear in the world!

Be cool or cute or whatever:

Customize your bear with costume and dance emotes received by completing stages in the game.

data.short_description: A webcam motion control fighting game in which you turn into a bear and get into the real action. Journey into the forest to find beehives, swipe those bees away, and claim your delicious honey prize. Could you satisfy your craving for yummy honey?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Quad Core Ryzen 5 - 2500U
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Additional Notes: A webcam is required to play this game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
